title: Worked Solution
text:
Expanding both sides and simplifying, we get:

8𝑞 + $$8$$ - $$5$$ $$=$$ 6𝑞 - $$12$$ - $$1$$

8𝑞 + $$3$$ $$=$$ 6𝑞 - $$13$$

Subtracting 6𝑞 from both sides, and adding $$13$$ to both sides, we get:

2𝑞 + $$16$$ $$=$$ $$13$$

Subtracting $$16$$ from both sides, we get:

2𝑞 $$=$$ $$-3$$

Dividing by $$2$$, we get:

𝑞 $$=$$ $$ rac{-3}{2}$$

Therefore, the solution is 𝑞 $$=$$ $$ rac{-3}{2}$$.
